TextBlock.Text: PHLOX: Daz, this technology is incredible.. However, I am curious why my sculpting tools I was carrying during projection did not appear to follow my voyage!
DAZ: Ah, I apologize, Phlox! But replicating tools and complex equipment out of liquid alloy with faithfulness has proven slightly impossible with our current technology.

DAZ: The <color=orange>voyagers</color> were designed for <color=orange>exploring dangerous environments,</color>and <color=orange>transport of small items in-person</color> primarily.. One should also be possible to activate vision-controlled mechanisms as well.
DAZ: I deeply apologize for this disappointment. For now, I am working on adding functionality to the voyagers' vessels to perhaps allow them to transcribe text!
PHLOX: I suppose it was rather fantastical of me to imagine the vessel would somehow replicate the properties and functions of my possessions!
PHLOX: But make no mistake, Daz: in no way does this diminish my awe for your new <color=orange>voyager stones!</color>
